mods.abstract: CBS syndication of KMOX (St. Louis, IL) radio program Mississippi Minstrels, originally broadcast June 10, 1949, part 3. Featuring 'interlocutor' Lambert Kaiman; the Mississippi Minstrel Band directed by Professor Stanley Daugherty; comedians Harry Fender, and Mose (played by Al Bland); and musicians Charlie Ackerson, Jerry Whittington (name unconfirmed), and the Magnolia Quartet. Written and produced by Al Bland.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
